mapper.select: select id, name, phone from user
select a.FID id, a.FNumber number, b.FName projectName from t_rt_rentcontract a join t_bdc_project b on a.FProjectID = b.FID
select a.FID id, a.FName name, b.FName projectName from t_rt_contracttype a join t_bdc_project b on a.FProjectID = b.FID
select a.FID id, a.FName name, b.FName projectName from t_rt_disbursement_type a join t_bdc_project b on a.FProjectID = b.FID
